branches.name: feature/weighted-edits
branches.rationale: Implementing weighted edits support is foundational for subsequent tasks that depend on it.

commits.title: Implement distance_with_weights method
commits.body: Added a new method to calculate edit distance with weighted character substitutions.
per_file_changes: Added distance_with_weights function to handle weighted edits.

commits.title: Update documentation for weighted edits
commits.body: Updated the documentation to include the new distance_with_weights method.
per_file_changes: Added details about the distance_with_weights method.

commits.title: Add tests for distance_with_weights
commits.body: Implemented tests to cover various scenarios for the distance_with_weights method.

branches.name: feature/max-distance-cutoff
branches.rationale: The max-distance cutoff option builds on the weighted edits support, allowing for early returns in distance calculations.

commits.title: Implement distance and similarity methods with max_dist
commits.body: Added new methods to handle max distance cutoff for distance and similarity calculations.
per_file_changes: Added distance(s1, s2, max_dist=N) and similarity(s1, s2, max_dist=N) methods.

commits.title: Update documentation for max distance methods
commits.body: Updated documentation to reflect the new max distance methods.
per_file_changes: Added details about the new distance and similarity methods with max_dist.

commits.title: Add benchmarks for max distance methods
commits.body: Implemented benchmarks to evaluate the performance of the new max distance methods.
per_file_changes: Added benchmark tests for distance and similarity methods with max_dist.

branches.name: feature/multi-threaded-batch-computation
branches.rationale: This task allows for faster processing and builds on the previous tasks.

commits.title: Implement batch_distance method
commits.body: Added a new method for batch processing of distance calculations.

commits.title: Update documentation for batch processing
commits.body: Updated documentation to include the new batch_distance method.
per_file_changes: Added details about the batch_distance method.

commits.title: Add performance test case for batch_distance
commits.body: Implemented performance tests for the batch_distance method.
per_file_changes: Added performance test cases for batch_distance.

branches.name: feature/output-edit-operations-path
branches.rationale: This task provides insights into edit operations and is dependent on previous tasks.

commits.title: Implement distance_with_ops method
commits.body: Added a new method to output the edit operations path.

commits.title: Update documentation for distance_with_ops
commits.body: Updated documentation to include the new distance_with_ops method.
per_file_changes: Added details about the distance_with_ops method.

commits.title: Add tests for distance_with_ops
commits.body: Implemented tests for the distance_with_ops method.

branches.name: feature/unicode-grapheme-clusters
branches.rationale: This task ensures correctness in distance calculations and is necessary for the fallback module.

commits.title: Add support for grapheme clusters
commits.body: Implemented support for Unicode grapheme clusters in distance calculations.

commits.title: Update documentation for grapheme support
commits.body: Updated documentation to reflect the new grapheme support.
per_file_changes: Added details about grapheme cluster support.

commits.title: Add tests for grapheme clusters
commits.body: Implemented tests to cover scenarios with grapheme clusters.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for grapheme cluster scenarios.

branches.name: feature/python-fallback-module
branches.rationale: This task ensures functionality on platforms where the C extension cannot compile.

commits.title: Implement levenshtein_py fallback module
commits.body: Added a pure-Python fallback module for compatibility.

commits.title: Add automatic selection logic
commits.body: Implemented logic to automatically select the appropriate module.
per_file_changes: Added logic to select between C extension and pure-Python fallback.

commits.title: Update documentation for fallback module
commits.body: Updated documentation to include details about the fallback module.
per_file_changes: Added details about the pure-Python fallback module.
